title: Most Toxic Player/Champion Combos
body:
So I was browsing the player moderation boards today (as I often do) and saw a thread commenting about how Nami players are always toxic.

And I thought "Huh. A toxic {{champion:267}}Nami. Don't think I've ever seen that. Usually it's a {{champion:11}}Yi or a {{champion:92}}Riven."

And it got me wondering what other people think when they see stuff like that. Which champion/player combos are the most toxic for you guys?

NOTE: This isn't to insult anyone or to stir up trouble. I'm just genuinely curious about the experiences of other people.

replies.body:
HAve you ever seen a toxic bard?
I've been a toxic bard. its why I stopped playing bard.
Lol no, but, I have been toxic to bard.

The enemy team every time I play Soraka.

My team every time I play Yorick.
Who isn't angry when you play yorick?
Soraka is no fun to play against, ad How t trash yorick, play ziggs top. Easiest laning phase you have ever seen. Worse then yolorick is Jayce.
Me when someone plays Sona and REQ auto with Lich Bane me.
I am the most toxic player character combo. I play  Riven, Yi, Zed, Tryndamere, yasuo, Nami, Vayne, and much much more.

Vayne.

Its always some pompous, bitchy vayne.

My team when we are playing nemesis draft and I give the enemy Rengar

http://abovethelaw.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/03/anger-angry-young-associates-lawyers-businesspeople.jpg
1. It was in customs and all 10 players were in the same discord room. I was given {{champion:28}}  and I don't jungle at all :<
